Welcome.intro: As I am curious and very interested in computers, I have decided to study development at Villetaneuse since September 2023. I am currently working toward a
Welcome.butInformatique: A three-year academic program in France. It covers topics such as algorithms, databases, and software development.

Traits.eagerDescription: Enthusiastic to continuously improve my skills, I dedicate myself to doing my absolute best when facing challenges, and I see them as opportunities to learn more.
Traits.drivenDescription: I deeply enjoy coding, to the extent that I can spend multiple hours, without even realizing it, to explore a new tool.
Traits.curiousDescription: Everything in IT is interesting for me, so I am always seeking to learn more about it. That is why I have an important knowledge of multiple subjects.

First.name: Hosting machine setup
First.description: My friends and I wanted to play together but renting servers would be inefficient and cost expensive. So, I turned a friend's spare laptop into a machine that could host multiple game servers simultaneously.

Second.name: Algorithms comparisons
Second.description: This project has been made in University and it was divised in two parts. I coded 3 ways to calculate the shortest route between multiple cities. Then, I compared them to find out which is the fastest and why.

ContactPage.title: Contact me
ContactPage.description: My inbox is always open. If you have a question or if you want to get in touch, I'll try my best to get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.subject: Subject

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.thirdPartyContentP1: Only one third party is used by this website :
PrivacyPolicyPage.thirdPartyContentP2: It mainly tracks the number of visitors, their devices types, their devices OS, their country, the web vital, and the number of times a page has been visited. No other data is shared with any other third party, and there is not any intrusive tracking.
PrivacyPolicyPage.cookiesContent: The first cookie used on this website is from Vercel, the hosting provider. Vercel uses a cookie to store an identifier for each user session, in order to avoid counting the same user multiple times. It is only used by Vercel and not shared with any other third party. The second cookie only stores the user's language preference, and it is only stored on the user's browser.

websiteHosting.description: This website is hosted by Vercel with the free plan.

He shall not be responsible for the content of any linked site, or any link contained within a linked site. In addition, all links towards this website are permitted as long as the origin does not diffuse any content that could be considered as offensive.

lawsAndDataCollection.descriptionP1: Everything collected on this website is mentionned in the

changes.title: Changes to this legal notice
changes.description: Mathis SAMAT reserves the right to update or modify this legal notice at any time without prior notice. Your use of this website following any such change constitutes your agreement to follow and be bound by the updated legal notice.

description.firstPart: I am Mathis SAMAT, a 19 year old student in France. I like science, so I specialized in Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics in secondary school.
description.secondPart: Throughout the years, I have discovered a lot about computers, and the more I dived into them, the more I was curious about them. After trying 3D Modeling, server hosting, image editing, writing my first lines of code, ... I was hooked, so I decided to study IT.
description.thirdPart: Now, I would love to join an IT company, to gain experience, and improve my skills.

outsideUniversity.title: Outside university
outsideUniversity.p1: Besides my interest in coding, I have multiple passions that I enjoy when I am not at university or coding at home.

p2.p1: Firstly, I am a car enthusiast. I am currently getting my license, and I genuinely enjoy sim racing. As a matter of fact, I participated in a
p2.p2: back in 2023 whose creator is a youtuber with almost 800 000 subscribers. When I uploaded my score, I stayed for multiple days on the podium, and I ended up in 12th place at the end. I am still proud of it, since, because of school, I didn't have a lot of time to practice unlike the others, so I couldn't do a lot of tries to improve my time.

outsideUniversity.p3: In addition, I do like hiking in beautiful places, which helps me to stay balanced and full of energy, bringing productivity and fresh perspective to my work. Here, you can scroll to see some of the best pictures I took when hiking in my opinion.
outsideUniversity.p4: Finally, I like guitar and most specifically electric guitar. I play mainly rock, but I like to play all styles. I practice daily to improve my skills to be able to reproduce the solos of my favorite artists. Sometimes, I play with a friend who plays guitar, and a friend who plays drums and piano.
